about.title: Fabio Mendes - Full Stack Developer with experience in data analysis and ETL
about.content: Full Stack Developer with experience in data analysis and ETL. Graduated in Information Systems and studying Computer Engineering. Post-graduate in Information Security. Experience in data analysis for strategic management in Public Health.

items.title: Web Developer at Company X (2020 - present)
items.description: Solid performance in IT for 12 years as Full Stack Developer, Data Analysis and technical support for infrastructure and systems. Combining deep technical knowledge with strategic business vision, allowing to deliver solutions that really impact the company's results.

skills.title: Skills

Advanced SQL, ETLs, automations, Python, Dash, Streamlit and Power BI

items.title: DW-saude
items.description: Data-Warehouse project, developed with Python, Dash, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, SQL and Docker. Data Warehouse with access control, which presents reports and graphs of health data from the e-SUS PEC electronic medical record, strategically necessary for management to monitor health indicators determined by the government for financial transfers, and also assists in providing insights and prospecting to improve production.
